'''v0.9.0 alpha build 6''' is the sixth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.9.0 alpha|v0.9.0]].<ref>{{Cite|url=https://archive.is/YENXT|title=Heyo, new build! Changelog for 0.9.0 build 6|author=Tommaso Checchi|website=Google+|date=June 19, 2014}} Archived June 19, 2014, at [[w:archive.today|archive.today]]</ref>

== Changes ==

* Lighting from [[Torch|torches]] is brighter and more Java-like

== Fixes ==

'''13 bugs fixed'''

* Fixed a [[crash]] when destroying a block under a rail
* Chunks now always update when the sky light changes
* [[Vines]] now work correctly
* Drip particles no longer have a black outline
* Made terrain rebuilding more stable under frequent updates ([[TNT]], falling [[sand]], etc)
* [[Mooshroom|Mooshrooms]] can breed
* The status of the player is reset when it dies (e.g. on [[fire]])
* Close button on [[Chest|chests]] works again
* Items are no longer placed in the [...] slot
* [[Grass]] tiles now decay under other blocks
* Crafting signs now yields 3 units
* Fixed many artifacts on doors
* End portal frame is now visible when held</onlyinclude>
